content:
# FACTORIO FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at position (-5.0, 2.5) with 12 coal
- Steam engine at position (0.5, 6.5)
- Small electric pole at position (3.5, 6.5)
- Additional small electric pole at position (0.5, 8.5)
- Pipe network connecting these components
The system is operational and generating electricity for the factory, producing about 89 water and 84 steam per minute.

### Iron Mining and Smelting at (19.5, 74.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position (19.5, 74.5) (currently inactive due to resource depletion)
- Stone furnace at position (20.0, 77.0) with 12 coal and 94 iron ore
- Inserter at position (20.5, 78.5)
- Wooden chest at position (20.5, 79.5) for iron plate storage (contains 164 iron plates)
- Additional wooden chest at position (20.5, 80.5)
- Small electric pole at position (21.5, 72.5) connecting the system to the power network
This system is no longer producing due to complete resource depletion.

### Copper Mining and Smelting at (-49.5, 81.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position (-49.5, 81.5) (currently inactive due to resource depletion)
- Stone furnace at position (-49.0, 84.0) with 12 coal and 94 copper ore
- Inserter at position (-48.5, 85.5)
- Wooden chest at position (-48.5, 86.5) for copper plate storage (contains 71 copper plates)
- Additional wooden chest at position (-48.5, 87.5)
- Small electric pole at position (-47.5, 79.5) connecting the system to the power network
This system is no longer producing due to complete resource depletion.

### Copper Cable Production at (-35.5, 87.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position (-35.5, 87.5) set to produce copper cables
- Inserter at position (-37.5, 87.5) to feed copper plates
- Wooden chest at position (-38.5, 87.5) for copper plate input
- Inserter at position (-33.5, 87.5) to extract copper cables
- Wooden chest at position (-32.5, 87.5) for copper cable output (contains 206 copper cables)
- Small electric pole at position (-33.5, 85.5) connecting the system to the power network
This system is operational but inactive due to lack of input resources.

### Electronic Circuit Production at (33.5, 80.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position (33.5, 80.5) set to produce electronic circuits
- Inserter at position (31.5, 80.5) to feed iron plates
- Wooden chest at position (30.5, 80.5) for iron plate input (contains 3 iron plates)
- Inserter at position (35.5, 80.5) to feed copper cables
- Wooden chest at position (36.5, 80.5) for copper cable input
- Inserter at position (33.5, 82.5) to extract electronic circuits
- Wooden chest at position (33.5, 83.5) for electronic circuit output (contains 64+ electronic circuits)
- Small electric poles at positions (35.5, 78.5) and (35.5, 82.5) connecting the system to the power network
This system is operational but inactive due to lack of input resources.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Check for existing items on the ground before placing chests or other entities
- When placing an entity fails, try increasing the spacing or changing the direction
- Be aware that dropped items on the ground can block entity placement
- Before attempting to place an entity, ensure the target location is clear
